Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory126.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I didn't expect that thing to blow up...", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'That machine is used for paving roads and exploration.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: '...Sorry I forgot to tell you earlier.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Every trapped person has been evacuated, Commandant.', 4: '2'}
{2: "Don't mention it.", 3: '19', 4: "It's all thanks to your help.", 5: '28'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'No...? You want actual money then.', 4: '2', 6: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "But sorry, I don't have so much money right now.", 4: '2', 6: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Um, we didn't do this for money.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Leader once said free things were the scariest.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Was Sophia... helpful?', 4: '2', 6: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Yes. The mission couldn't have been so smooth without you convincing those people.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'So Jamilah, that puppet leader, asked you for help...', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Her Majesty is no puppet.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Looks like you are hiding something.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The arrogant "aristocrats," and the all-obeying civilians who are sacrificed. If we add in this trade that you keep talking about...', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Let's cut straight to the point. You're trying to do something with this chaos, aren't you?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Maybe Sophia can tell us.', 3: '43'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: '...The civilians here came from all over the world.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Some are workers, some were sold to the train like Changyu.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Aristocrats are born to be aristocrats. Asslam is a private train bought by our leader's grandfather.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'The aristocrats have been living in the Eternal Engine ever since it first started. They are the only ones who have access to private cabins.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'They have always hated the civilians, and call them cockroaches who keep reproducing.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "That's why they sacrificed the commoner carriage without a blink...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Ashlar represents the aristocrats. They have long planned for a trade like this to make themselves part of the Ascendants.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'So they can break away from this "unfree" life, where they have to share resources with the civilians.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Ridiculous. If becoming an Ascendant is so simple, Roland would have done it long ago!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: '...That\'s why Leader came up with a safer alternative—to trade the "merchandise" for the right to live in Babylonia.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'When you say "leader," do you mean Jamilah? Not Aston?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Aston is only pretending to be an aristocrat to help Leader maintain the balance between classes.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'I never knew the internal relationship of ACA could be so complicated...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: '...Can I ask you a question?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Please.', 3: '72', 4: "As long as it doesn't involve anything top secret.", 5: '72'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I want to know how it feels to stay in Babylonia.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'The space is dark and cold, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: '...Do you fear it?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Of course we do.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Even when we are in Babylonia, the so-called safest place in the universe. That's why we want to come back here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Is that so... Hmm, in other words, Babylonia isn't that nice a place...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I didn't expect that to come from you, Lucia.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I was only imitating Commandant. This is what Commandant would have said.', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: "That's my team!", 3: '91', 4: "I probably wouldn't have been able to say that...", 5: '92'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "We've been with Commandant for so long, after all.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Sophia! Come back, now—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "What's going on?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "It's those guys... Dammit—", 4: '1'}
